sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"出版物，定期刊物"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: magazine, journal, periodical, publication, newspaper, review, press
means: magazine ： 指刊登各种文章、小说、诗歌、评议的杂志。
journal ： 本义为"日报"，现在可指定期发生的周刊、月刊、季刊等或指学术团体出版的刊物、杂志或学报。
periodical ： 通常指除日报以外的定期出版刊物。
newspaper ： 一般指每日出版的报纸。
review ： 多指登载评论性文章或讨论重大事件的文章的刊物。
press ： 系报刊总称，也指报界或报业。

lj.lj_ly: The matter is still under review.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (as a noun denoting a formal inspection of military or naval forces): from obsolete French reveue, from revoir 'see again'

entry.def: A review of a situation or system is its formal examination by people in authority. This is usually done in order to see whether it can be improved or corrected.

example.ex: The president ordered a review of US economic aid to Jordan...
example.tran: 总统下令对美国向约旦提供的经济援助进行审查。

example.ex: The White House quickly announced that the policy is under review.
example.tran: 白宫很快宣布该项政策正在审核中。

entry.tran: 仔细研究;审视;细查;详查
entry.def: If you review a situation or system, you consider it carefully to see what is wrong with it or how it could be improved.

example.ex: The Prime Minister reviewed the situation with his Cabinet yesterday...
example.tran: 昨天，首相和他的内阁对局势进行了审度。

example.ex: The next day we reviewed the previous day's work.
example.tran: 第二天，我们仔细检查了头一天的工作。

entry.tran: （对书、电影等的）评论文章;书评;影评
entry.def: A review is a report in the media in which someone gives their opinion of something such as a new book or film.

example.ex: Disney's 'Beauty And The Beast' has won rave reviews...
example.tran: 迪斯尼出品的电影《美女与野兽》赢得了众多好评。

example.ex: We've never had a good review in the music press.
example.tran: 我们从未在音乐媒体获得过好评。

entry.tran: 写（新书、新上映电影等）的评论
entry.def: If someone reviews something such as a new book or film, they write a report or give a talk on television or radio in which they express their opinion of it.

example.ex: Richard Coles reviews all of the latest video releases...
example.tran: 理查德·科尔斯为所有最新发行的录影带都写了评论。

example.ex: His book about Afghanistan is reviewed here by Anthony Hyman.
example.tran: 安东尼·海曼在此就他那本关于阿富汗的书写了书评。

entry.def: When a military or political leader reviews troops, they examine them, or watch them marching.

example.ex: When he reviewed the troops they cheered him as he smiled and raised his hat.
example.tran: 他检阅军队时微笑着举起帽子，人们与此同时都向他欢呼。

entry.def: When you review for an examination, you read things again and make notes in order to be prepared for the examination.

example.ex: Reviewing for exams gives you a chance to bring together all the individual parts of the course...
example.tran: 考前复习让你有机会把一门课程所有零碎的知识都融会贯通。

example.ex: Review all the notes you need to cover for each course.
example.tran: 把每一门课程需要掌握的笔记都复习一下。

means.word_mean: 2. an essay or article that gives a critical evaluation (as of a book or play)
3. a subsequent examination of a patient for the purpose of monitoring earlier treatment
4. (accounting) a service (less exhaustive than an audit) that provides some assurance to interested parties as to the reliability of financial data
5. a variety show with topical sketches and songs and dancing and comedians
6. a periodical that publishes critical essays on current affairs or literature or art
7. a summary at the end that repeats the substance of a longer discussion
8. (law) a judicial reexamination of the proceedings of a court (especially by an appellate court)
9. practice intended to polish performance or refresh the memory

"She reviews books for the New York Times"
"I reviewed the material before the test"

means.word_mean: 5. look back upon (a period of time, sequence of events, etc.); remember;

Sentence.sentence: Instead, you just need to review your marks and you can save a lot of time.
By reviewing only the marked parts.

As well as the background checks carried out by platform owners, online reviews and ratings are usually posted by both parties to each transaction, which makes it easy to spot bad drivers, bathrobe-thieves and surfboard-wreckers

In an interview with the Paris Review Hughes speculated that when a person puts pen to paper, "you meet the terrible resistance of what happened your first year at it, when you couldn't write at all".
A recent review of California community colleges found that while a third of the Asian students picked up their degrees, only 15% of African-Americans did so as well.
How many African-American students earned their degrees in California community colleges according to a recent review

means.word_mean: 回顾; 检查; 检讨; 重新考虑

sentences.en: These arrangements are subject to periodic reviews.
sentences.cn: 这几项安排须定期检查。

sentences.en: The college published a drama review.
sentences.cn: 学院出版了一份戏剧评论刊物。

sentences.en: The soldiers were in full uniform for the review.
sentences.cn: 士兵们身着全套军礼服准备接受检阅。

sentences.en: Before falling asleep, Helen reviewed the day's happenings.
sentences.cn: 海伦在入睡以前回想了当天发生的事情。

sentences.en: Have you reviewed what we covered in class yesterday?
sentences.cn: 昨天我们课堂上讲的东西你们复习了吗?

sentences.en: In preparing for the final examination,she reviewed all the notes she had taken.
sentences.cn: 为准备期末考试，她把所有的笔记都复习了一遍。

sentences.en: She reviews the new movie once a week in one of the evening papers.
sentences.cn: 她在一家晚报上每周评论一次新影片。

sentences.en: He reviews articles in his spare time.
sentences.cn: 他在业余时间写评论文章。

sentences.en: Have you reviewed for this newly published novel?
sentences.cn: 你给这本新出版的小说写书评了吗?

sentences.en: They reviewed for the term examination till late at night.
sentences.cn: 他们为期未考试复习功课直到深夜。

jushi.english: These arrangements are subject to periodic reviews.
jushi.chinese: 这几项安排须定期检查。

jushi.english: That magazine contains good reviews of the movies.
jushi.chinese: 那本杂志刊载着很好的影评。
